name: [WIP] Market Manipulation
description:
Click on the map to create a waypoint for your cart. Click on the last waypoint to start the carts journey.

When you arrive at a city you'll be able to trade goods with them. The prices that cities trade goods at is defined by that kingdom's supply and demand of each good. Selling a good to a city will increase that cities supply, often reducing the trade price. The supply bonus wears off over time.

Travelling is costly and dangerous. Each tile your cart travels across will have a cost and chance for being raided. The cost is determined by the terrain type. The chance of a raid is determined by how desperate the people of the kingdom are.
